column1: Kata Robata////Great place!!  Loved the atmosphere
column3: service...everything!  A packed house on a Tuesday night must mean something.  Our server was very helpful with recommendations and low and behold
column4: I loved what he suggested - the Ocean Picante roll.  I also had a few pieces of nigiri (fresh salmon
column7: all delicious.  Try the oyster mushrooms; they are out of this world
column8: and I am not a huge fan of mushrooms normally.  I am no vegetarian
column9: but I really liked some of their veg options that my friend ordered (namely the sweet egg sushi).  I was very impressed with this place and can't wait to go back next time I feel a sushi craving coming on.  Oh
column10: and having Arian Foster at the next table was pretty cool too!
